abstract.t: This draft describes a profile for compressing SCTP/IP using theRobust Header Compression Formal Notation.The RObust Header Compression [1] scheme is designed to compresspacket headers over error prone channels. It is built around anextensible core framework that can be tailored to compress newprotocol stacks by adding additional ROHC profiles.This profile describes a new profile for ROHC which will allow SCTP/IP headers to be compressed.
